text: aur hamane unake ehad va paimaan kee vajah se unake (sar) par (kohe) toor ko lataka diya aur hamane unase kaha ki (shahar ke) daravaaze mein sajada karate hue daakhil ho aur hamane (ye bhee) kaha ki tum haphte ke din (hamaare hukm se) tajaavuz na karana aur hamane unase bahut mazaboot ehado paimaan le liya
